snippet: Facebook is so last month. The new hot thing in Silicon Valley is apparently Ponzify, writes John Flowers of McSweeney's. In his satirical take on a prospectus, Mr. Flowers pokes fun at the recent string of tech I.P.O.s, with plenty of jabs for...
abstract: Facebook is so last month. The new hot thing in Silicon Valley is apparently Ponzify, writes John Flowers of McSweeney's. In his satirical take on a prospectus, Mr. Flowers pokes fun at the recent string of tech I.P.O.s, with plenty of jabs for Facebook, Groupon and Zynga. "Our primary measurement of revenue is a non-GAAP accounting principle known as Adjusted Consolidated Assumed Income (ACAI)," Mr. Flowers writes.

headline.main: Meet Ponzify, the Next Hot Tech I.P.O.
